meta.description: Optimize the transportation of equipment and staff using mobile production units to minimize parking spots.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of mobile production unit in terms of people

params.name: parking_spots
params.description: Number of parking spots required for each type of mobile production unit

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of mobile production unit used

objective.name: min_total_parking_spots
objective.description: Minimize the total number of parking spots required

constraints.name: people_transport_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 80 people can be transported

constraints.name: min_small_units
constraints.description: At least 5 units must be small mobile units

constraints.name: large_units_percentage
constraints.description: Large units must make up at least 75% of all vehicles
